messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 497
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/2002 10:26:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I ll have to second this! We visited Sharon and Roy earlier this year, and my 14 year old
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/2002 10:26:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
> It is fun to teach kids to drive :-) Aren't there any
> backroads? Out by the prairie-dog towns maybe?
> Driver's Ed. is good for insurance discounts, but not
> anything else that I can think of. He can come borrow
> our dirt road. He will have to watch out for the other
> unliscened learners, though, and for Brer Terrypin,
> and don't go all the way to the sand-trap!
>
> Roy sits on my lap to steer home. I work the peddles
> and he does the rest. First he always gets the radio
> station he prefers :-).

I'll have to second this!

We visited Sharon and Roy earlier this year, and my 14 year old drove several
miles on her roads in my brand new van.

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
